title: Candy (so good)
lyrics:
guleum sog-eul hemaedeon
dolgo dolmyeo gamgineun oh right
dalkomhan han-ibmajeo
nog-aseo tto salajine oh no
kkeunh-im eobsneun ibmajchum
ttagttaghan neoui ban-eung

I wanna make you soft

Want you to spin arounds

akkyeojugo sipjiman

mam-i apseoganeun nan

Hold on hold on hold on

You look so good

Common baby

Your taste is so good

Just like candy on my lips

So good if you want me

I can take it slow

son-e kkwag neoleul jwigo

namgim-eobs-i chumchugo intertwine

sigan-i deo galsulog

ungkeulimyeo jag-ajineun you’re spine

doedollil su eobsneun time

heomuhaejil geogjeong-e

Baby let’s take it slow

Don’t wanna go to fast

imi neuj-eun geos gat-a

neomu apseo nagan nan

Go on go on go on

You look so good

Common baby

Your taste is so good

Just like candy on my lips

So good if you want me

I can take it slow

You are so good

Common baby

Your taste is so good

Just like candy on my lips

So good if you want me

I can take it slow
